page.title: 09 Recreation
page.content: Yardley Hastings has a playground which has a roundabout, a pair of swings,a big slide, a little slide and a seasaw.A travelling fair visits the the recreation field each year with a variety of amusements Yardley Hastings has a lot of open spaces where children can play safely. The village has a youth club for boys and girls up to 11 years of age.The clubmeets in the Memorial Institute every Tuesday at 7.30p.m. Cubs and Brownies have to be transported to the village of Grendon every Tuesday between 5.00 and 7.00p.m. Dancing classes are held in the Chapel Room on Saturday mornings from 9.00 to 12.00 for children, with lessons in Ballt, Greek, and Tap. Other sorts on offer include Badminton in the village hall, Cricket at Grendon, Keep-Fit, and Football
